attributes.action: Reject the leave result of the EU referendum and remain
attributes.additional_details: Only 200 of the 650 MPs voted to leave. Parliament knows that remaining in the EU is better for Britain and its people. Reject the referendum.
attributes.background: The EU referendum was poorly fought. The U.K. Public were not given adequate information about the consequences of leaving the EU. The U.K. Government knows that it is better for the UK to remain in the EU. Reject the narrow leave result of the referendum and remain.
